title: Ticket #4924: Document that PRE/POST scripts can't be used on splices
description:
It doesn't look like the manual documents the fact that you can't have a PRE or POST script on a splice. I suspect that there may be other limitations of splices that are also missing, although it is documented that you can't have retries on a splice.

The list of things that don't work on splices:

  • PRE/POST scripts
  • PRE_SKIP (obviously)
  • NOOP - not an option in the specification of a splice
  • DONE - not an option in the specification of a splice
  • RETRY (already documented)
  • VARS - can't apply to a splice as a whole, and the node names change for those within the splice, so not appropriate to use
  • PRIORITY - can't apply to a splice as a whole, and the node names change for those within the splice, so not appropriate to use
  • CATEGORY (already documented)
